properties.name: httpfeed.server.feed
properties.description: Name of the feed. Defaults to `feed`.

properties.name: httpfeed.server.path
properties.description: Required. The URI path of the feed. Should start with `/`.

properties.name: httpfeed.server.limit
properties.description: Max items to return per request. Defaults to 1000.

properties.name: httpfeed.server.jdbc.table
properties.description: JDBC Database table name to be used by the org.restfeeds.server.spring.JdbcFeedRepository. Defaults to `feed`.

properties.name: httpfeed.server.poll-intervall
properties.description: Database poll interval when using long polling.

properties.name: httpfeed.server.credentials[0].username
properties.description: Specifies a list of basic auth credentials. Active, if spring-security is in in classpath and no other WebSecurity Configuration is present.

properties.name: httpfeed.server.credentials[0].password
properties.description: Specifies a list of basic auth credentials. Active, if spring-security is in in classpath and no other WebSecurity Configuration is present.
